name: Goiko Grill
address: Avenida Alberto Alcocer, 42, 28016 Madrid, Spain
review:
Finally a place in Madrid with salt and seasoning on their burgers and fries.

The food is really good here. It is definitely a go to if you're in Madrid.. It is twice as thick as the "napkin plus" of "Brooklyn Burger", the best hamburger in Korea.
Adding mushrooms to a kevin set is the best combination.
I can.... This is a great spot for a burger. Finding good food in Madrid was a challenge for me. This spot will not disappoint..
